item.title: Ntp
item.description: NTP NFS: Network Time Protocol UTC: Coordinated Universal Time, 世界统一时间 GMT: Greenwich Mean Time, 格林尼治标准时间, = UTC CET: Central European Time, 欧洲中部时间, = UTC+1, 下令时=UTC+2 CST: Chinese Standard Time, 中国标准时间, = UTC+8 时区管理 $
